name: MySchoolPortal
0:
”Alexa, open My School Portal”
”What homework needs to be done today?”
”Does anyone have sport tomorrow?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my school portal
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My School Portal is a secure platform that helps you to become more engaged with your child's education. We make it easy for you to easily find important information and messages all brought together in one place.

This skill is able to give you access to your messages from the school, information about any homework or assignments that your child needs to do, and information about what lessons are coming up. 

We are working to allow access to parents evening information, exam timetables, and extra-curricular clubs and activities as well as some other features. This skill will just be one more way for you to access your My School Portal data in a way that is easy and convenient for you.

You will need to link your My School Portal account to be able to use this skill.
